commitResults.messageTitle: Changed Duke to Legin and completed greet and bye functions

commitResults.messageBody:
echos commands entered by the user, and exits when
the user types the command bye

Stores the tasks that user inputs and outputs the list when user enter
command "list"

commitResults.messageTitle: Added marking and unmarking task functions
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, the bot is only able to store the list of task being done but
there is no way of allowing users to track if task is done

Added marking symbols with "X" between "[ ]" braces after the indexing
of task to allow user to track if task is done. User is able to ivoke
markTask() and unmarkTask() functions through entering keywords such as
"mark" and "unmark" respectively followed by the index of the task in
list() function to mark and unmark the tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed bugs with mark and unmark functions
commitResults.messageBody:
The code is only able to mark and unmark indexes up to 9 due to the way
the function is implemented.

The number of task that the bot is implemented for is up to 100 meaning
the indexes goes up to 99. Thus it needs to be changed to accomodate
this.

The code is rectified and fixed to fit the constrain.

commitResults.messageTitle: Minor edits to conform to coding standards
